segments.text: I can't take my eyes off that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, it looks so incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, reaching for those cookies, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any slight shift in weight, and he's going to go tumbling backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep imagining the sound of the crash and his cry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is right there, so close, she could get caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, just a few feet away, is completely unaware of this acrobatic feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me quite angry that she's so distracted by a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be paying attention to what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to a serious injury, and all for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a truly heart-stopping moment, watching him sway slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I'm just an observer here.
segments.speaker: PAR
